cast.name: 埃米尔·库苏莫 Emil Kusumo
欧内斯特·萨穆德拉 Ernest Samudera
冯尼·安格莱尼 Vonny Anggraini

writer.name: 拉哈比·曼德拉 Rahabi Mandra

director.name: 拉哈比·曼德拉 Rahabi Mandra

introduction: Almond Surendra, a marriage consultant who is trying very hard to maintain his client's household. This year, Almond intends to propose to Arum, his dream girl and childhood friend. Arum's parents also often asked their daughter to get married. Unfortunately, the pandemic made Almond try even harder to make money. The marriage consulting business that was built went bankrupt while the pandemic is still not known when it will end. Bima Sena will play the role of Takdir, a street busker who makes his living as a paid spy to investigate the affairs of several couples. Seeing Fate's unusual work, at first Almond didn't want to get involved. But after seeing the results, he finally became a detective.
